alert.note: Alert for Nicholas; Robertson (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 07 at 7:00PM EST until March 10 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...Forecast flooding changed to Minor severity for the following rivers in Kentucky... Licking River at Blue Licks Spring affecting Robertson and Nicholas Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Licking River at Blue Licks Spring. * WHEN...Until Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 25.0 feet, Cropland flooding begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:00 PM EST Monday the stage was 26.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 29.2 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Wednesday evening. - Flood stage is 25.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 28.2 feet on 09/25/2006. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Stay tuned to NOAA Weather Radio and your local media for the latest information. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/lmk. The next statement will be issued Tuesday morning.
